document.query: UPDATE `language_translation` SET `content` = 'Personal Group Bonus' WHERE `code` = (SELECT language_code FROM `mlm_bonus` WHERE name = 'goldmineBonus') AND `language` = 'english';
UPDATE `language_translation` SET `content` = 'Personal Group Bonus' WHERE `code` = (SELECT language_code FROM `mlm_bonus` WHERE name = 'goldmineBonus') AND `language` = 'chineseSimplified';
UPDATE `language_translation` SET `content` = 'Personal Group Bonus' WHERE `code` = (SELECT language_code FROM `mlm_bonus` WHERE name = 'goldmineBonus') AND `language` = 'chineseTraditional';
UPDATE `language_translation` SET `content` = 'Personal Group Bonus' WHERE `code` = (SELECT language_code FROM `mlm_bonus` WHERE name = 'goldmineBonus') AND `language` = 'vietnam';
UPDATE `language_translation` SET `content` = 'Personal Group Bonus' WHERE `code` = (SELECT language_code FROM `mlm_bonus` WHERE name = 'goldmineBonus') AND `language` = 'malay';
UPDATE `language_translation` SET `content` = 'Personal Group Bonus' WHERE `code` = (SELECT language_code FROM `mlm_bonus` WHERE name = 'goldmineBonus') AND `language` = 'japanese';
UPDATE `language_translation` SET `content` = 'Personal Group Bonus' WHERE `code` = (SELECT language_code FROM `mlm_bonus` WHERE name = 'goldmineBonus') AND `language` = 'korean';
